data.text: Nà ga zunui nii unfegi zeeliai ma
É liini ga ze, gè siɛi wo
Nà nɔ yeenɔpɛ nɔ
É mà zuai vɔɔni su ta kɔ̀lɔgi,
É koozuʋiligi ta kpɔlɔi
É dɔ̀ɔni kpidii zu
É màalatini ga gè mina ɠula,
Gè ɓɔlɔa ga kpeei loa, gè kpɔbai ɠaiziɛ,
É pelei laaɠuluga tùɠɔ ga kɔtu ziɠigiti,
É ɠɛni bɛ̀ ga filɛ zuai, é zei tùɠɔ,
É sèɠea pelei ʋa, é bàliʋali,
É ná-mɛɛin zumɛɛnga,
É sàamaʋɛ zuvoloni ga
Nuɓusɛiti pɛ ta ɲɛɛɠulazu sù,
É kògi zulaave ga ani wanaiti,
É ɲìigaiti gaaɠaleni ga ɲaɠae numagai,
É ziilɛigi ɠulaa zèa,
Gè ɠɛni ma: «Kito ge la bɛ̀,
Ee! Ɠizɛ nà-nimizai zu ta nà-kpɔlɔi,
Kì ka su, gè la yeema ma ɠɔ,
Kɛlɛ wɛlɛ nii gè pɔ gè ɗa ɠisiɛ su zìimaʋɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zu la ɓɔlɔa ga ná-wooɠɛɠiladai,
Toɠa ɗa ti niinɛ sobu-o-sobu.
Nà bosu, gè ɠɛ ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ga nà-naavoloi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI laavegɛ ga nuɓɔɠɔlai naama nui ʋɛ nii é ɠitosu ba,
Pagɛ nu maaɠɛ kpɔ,
Pagɛ nui ma è yeezei faaɓaagiti bu
È zei yɛ, è ɠaalɛi,
È maayei, è laa lɔ fufiligi zu,
È ɠomagi ve è woizuloɠa nui ya,
Mazɔlɔɔ Maliɠii la ɗa ga nu ʋiliga ya
Kɛlɛ ni a nu ɠaazuɠili vai ɠɛɛna,
Mazɔlɔɔ ziima la de ga é ʋa nuɓusɛiti unfe,
Siɛgi zu ti ɠɔɠɔlosu da
siɛgi zu ti lɛɠɛzu la GALA su, nii é Anii-Pɛ-Unda,
siɛgi zu ti nui ta ná-tukpɔi maaʋesu da,
Ɓɛ ɠa a wooi wona, su vaiti ta ɗa ɠɛ?
GALA nii é Anii-Pɛ-Unda, naa laawooi laade
Leeni vaa zu nuɓusɛi a kpee loo, tama é vulua?
De ɠida de-ziɛ ʋeleiti bu,
Ade GALA fali ga yii pɛ, de yeeiti tɛ
Gi ɗa-lɔgiti koloɠoloni, gi ɓakani!
È ɓɔɠɔ maaɠilini ɗa-yiiɠaawanai zu,
È ɓɔɠɔ maalɔɔɠuni ga tonaɓiingi,
È gi ɠɛɛni ga kaʋai,
Gi zili nuiti ta laalaosu
Gɔnɔi yɛga duai ma ta gaazulatigi,
Gàazuɗɛiti ta ʋuuzu eɠɛ kɔtuɗɛiti
Gɔlɔɗɛi ɠa gàazuʋɛti, maaleʋe la ba,
eyɛsu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yɛ geezuʋɛ,
Nii é zeelizu nà-taazu anzalopoiti ma,
Ta pòlu, ti ɗa kpɛ̀ eɠɛ wɔni,
Ti mà vului lɔɔɠua zeɠezaɠai zu,
Ziɛi lɛɛni, é ɓudɛ nɔ̀ungi maazu,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gè yɛni zeɠe ɓomaʋɛ,
È nà-kpee wooi mɛnini:
Voloi gè wooɠulani la è ma, è maaɓuɠani bà,
Maliɠii, è màavaawoga,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è kakama vai ɠaa ti kɛai ga ze,
È pɛtɛga ʋelei ti potokulai ɠɛɛzu la ze,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è ta-ʋoomu gooiti pɛ mɛnini,
Sìli nuiti ta-ɓɔɛzuɠulaiti ta ta-ɠisiɛiti,
Ti ɠɛni zeini, ti ɠɛni loni,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ti zo
Ɗa ti-yii zasa ti ɠoozu,
Ɗa ɗa-yiiɠaawanai ʋilɛ ti ʋolu,
